title: W. W. Norton
text: is an award-winning, easy-to-use adaptive learning tool that includes InQuizitive, SmartWork and eText.The company publishes books on a wide range of subjects, including literature, poetry, textbooks and nonfiction. Some of its most well-known publications include the Norton Anthology of English Literature and the Norton Critical Editions series. The company is also known for its "Norton Guides," which are study aids for literature and other subjects.
